title: @riot Kateykhaos... what is his/her job exactly?
body: So riot says that they don't have enough riot members to reply to everyone, but then their are members like KateyKhaos who reply to gratuitous content and i am sure their are other members like her/him who do the same. Like is his/her job legit to just go on forums and find forums that she/he likes that mostly have to do with Champion skins and some sort of "League fun time" things and post on them rather then help people that have serious issues? Then in that case SIGN ME UP

replies.body:
I'm a Content QA Analyst, and I work on the skins team. 

I'm constantly looking at feedback for skins related content, which means commenting on skin-related bugs in Report A Bug, as well commenting on content in Skins & Champion Concepts. 

With that being said, I do spend time on other boards, but the majority of that is done on the weekend/when I'm not at work, and it's more for fun. 

Hope that clears things up a bit. :3

>I'm constantly looking at feedback for skins related content

Ghostbride Morgana. Dark Binding. Low graphics settings. 

"That's odd, I thought Dark Binding had a much longer range than tha-"

*Binding hits*
This issue has been addressed, and should be fixed shortly. :]
Awesome. Keep up the good work!

If you mouse over the player name it says "Content QA Analyst" which if it's like other gaming positions means she QAs (that's testing) content for the game. I'm not sure what that is specifically, be it looking for art issues or game mechanics, etc.

Truth be told though you probably don't care, you're just another person who doesn't understand that teams work on different things who bitches for the sake of it and are a large part of the reason reds aren't around as much anymore. For example, an art team member probably has no idea how servers or network operations work. I know it's confusing for you, but in time I bet you'll get it if you try really hard.

Okay first of all don't go around replying to people like a ass hole, and second i understand how a team works, but um what does "Hey guys look i made a drawing" have to do with anything? or replying to things like "Have any of you ever shared a thread you liked on GD on Facebook or Twitter?" wth does that have to do with mechanics or game art issues????
Well,it could mean that they're just casually chatting on the forums.These are humans too.They're allowed to comment on topics like any other forum go-er.
I think QA means Quality Assurance.

Riot KateyKhaos is the best rioter I know. No joke. The most active rioter and probably nicest. Keep up the good work. Spread the news. I am sure people know that she is awesome.


*Favorite rioter:* **Riot KateyKhaos**
**+ Most active on boards
+ Kind 
+ Gives helpful advice 
+ Posts**
